metadata.title: CVE-2010-1161 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Race condition in GNU nano before 2.2.4, when run by root to edit a filethat is not owned by root, allows local user-assisted attackers to changethe ownership of arbitrary files via vectors related to the creation ofbackup files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-1161` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nano - 2.2.4-1
nano-tiny - 2.2.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nano package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.4-1').
